About Me

I'm Marko Idžan, and I'm IT Technician with knowledge of Web Design and Administration. I can make you cool web sites, web shops and way more smaller projects if needed. With knowledge of IT Administration which I learned trough all education, I also create creative Photos of nature and Educational Videos. It is not professional look alike, but it can look professionaly made.
